title: 2 Bedroom Apt - South Lake in Pasadena
app_fee: App fee $25.00 for credit check – 720+ credit score required
posting_body: ['2 Bedroom Apt - South Lake in Pasadena', 'Property Address', '677 S Lake Ave Apt I | Pasadena, CA 91106', 'Available: 07/15/2022', 'Offered By', 'SGV Management, LLC', 'Description', 'RENOVATED 2 Bedroom, 1 Bath', 'Desirable location in South Lake District of Pasadena', 'Upstairs unit', 'Recessed lighting', 'New hardwood flooring', 'Unit includes stove, microwave and refrigerator', 'New kitchen cabinets and sink', 'Three high-efficiency multi-zone mini-split air conditioning and heating units', 'Renovated bathroom tub/shower, tile, sink, toilet, lighting', 'Water and trash included', 'Community laundry on site', 'One carport space', 'Take a 3-D Virtual Tour at this link:', '<URL>', 'Walking distance to Lake Ave shops and restaurants, coffee shops.', 'Close to Cal Tech, Old Town, Paseo Colorado, Rose Bowl, Pasadena Central Library, Brookside & Arroyo golf courses, Pasadena City College, Design School, Metro Rail station', 'Tobacco-free property', 'Sorry!', 'No dogs allowed', 'One indoor cat allowed with additional pet deposit', 'A 720 OR HIGHER CREDIT SCORE IS REQUIRED FOR EACH ADULT', 'TO SCHEDULE A VIEWING', 'CALL:', 'show contact info', 'OR VISIT: <URL>', '677 S Lake Ave, Apt A, Pasadena, CA 91106', 'One (1) year lease required with security deposit', 'We manage several other Pasadena properties.', 'If this unit isn’t quite what you’re looking for, inquire about other availabilities!', 'Avoid Scammers!', 'SGV Management, LLC only accepts', 'online applications and online payment through our website', 'or by cashiers check at our office at 133 E Duarte Rd in Arcadia', 'Find an Apartment - Book a Viewing - Apply Online at:', '<URL>', 'Details', 'Beds/Baths: 2BD/1.0BA', 'Rental Terms', 'Lease: One year', 'Rent: $2,795.00', 'Available: 07/15/2022', 'Application Fee: $25.00', 'Security Deposit: $2,500.00']
